title: Introduce the Axiom of Power Sets (extension)

blocks.name: alneu
blocks.content: If a statement holds for all sets, there is not a unique set for which the statement holds. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: eu2ndop1stv
blocks.content: If there is a unique second component in an ordered pair contained in a given set, the first component must be a set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 29-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm eu2ndop1stv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpcom(weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1)))
  euex(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1))
  exlimi(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wi(weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, universe)))
  nfim(s0, weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  nfeu1(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1))
  nfel1(s0, c0, universe)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  con4d(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  ex(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wn(wcel(c0, universe))), wn(weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1))), wn(weu(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1))))
  impcom(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(weu(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1))))
  syl6bi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wn(weu(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1))), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  syl(wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(weu(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1))), wal(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1)))
  ax-5(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1))
  alneu(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1))
  adantl(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wb(wn(weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1))), wn(weu(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1)))))
  notbid(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), weu(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1)), weu(s0, wcel(emptycls, c1)))
  eubidv(s0, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  eleq1d(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  opprc1(c0, cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, emptycls, c1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(c0, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eu2ndop1stv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1)→ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpcom(∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1))
  euex(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1)
  exlimi(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1, (∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1)→ c0 ∈ 𝕌))
  nfim(s0, ∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  nfeu1(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1)
  nfel1(s0, c0, universe)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  con4d(< c0, s0 > ∈ c1, ∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ex(< c0, s0 > ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ ∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1))
  mpbird((< c0, s0 > ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌), ¬ ∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1), ¬ ∃!(s0, ∅ ∈ c1))
  impcom(< c0, s0 > ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ ∃!(s0, ∅ ∈ c1))
  syl6bi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1, ¬ ∃!(s0, ∅ ∈ c1), ∅ ∈ c1)
  syl(∅ ∈ c1, ¬ ∃!(s0, ∅ ∈ c1), ∀(s0, ∅ ∈ c1))
  ax-5(s0, ∅ ∈ c1)
  alneu(s0, ∅ ∈ c1)
  adantl(< c0, s0 > ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, (¬ ∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1)↔ ¬ ∃!(s0, ∅ ∈ c1)))
  notbid(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃!(s0, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1), ∃!(s0, ∅ ∈ c1))
  eubidv(s0, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, < c0, s0 > ∈ c1, ∅ ∈ c1)
  eleq1d(< c0, s0 >, c1, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  opprc1(c0, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, emptycls, c1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
